name: Just Spin
description:
Click to jump and earn points. Simple enough, right?

ARCADE MODE

Compete with others to see how many levels you can complete.

ENDLESS MODE

Featuring daily and all-time leaderboards to showcase your skills.

UNLOCKABLES

  • 5 Charming Characters
  • 5 Groovy Music Tracks
  • 8 Unique Themes
  • 12 Wild Backgrounds

This game was made for Steam and isn't a mobile port!

If you like what you see, please consider leaving a review to support new features like achievements, trading cards, multiple platforms and new unlockables.
